home.title: Hi, I'm Allan
home.description: Web developer with strong experience in building functional and scalable digital products. Specialized in modern web technologies, with a focus on performance, accessibility, and great user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: I am a software developer passionate about creating digital solutions that generate real impact. I have several years of experience building web and mobile applications, including Web3 projects and traditional systems. My journey includes volunteer work, technical leadership, and turning ideas into real products. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Flutter, Dart, and AWS Serverless architecture. I am a self-taught, dedicated, and persistent full stack developer with strong attention to detail and a focus on quality, performance, and accessibility. I believe that even the smallest adjustments make a difference in the final result. Outside of coding, I enjoy games, anime, traveling, hiking, nature, and graffiti. I am always looking for new challenges and professional growth.
about.imageAlt: Photo of the author Allan Prado

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Most recent work
portfolio.luckysea: Development of a responsive NFT lootbox for desktop and web apps, featuring custom roulette systems, cards, and exclusive illustrations. The project uses React, TypeScript, ethers.js, and Web3 technologies, with direct blockchain integration and on-chain interactions.
portfolio.greengrocer: Development of an e-commerce application for Android and iOS focused on selling fruits, vegetables, and fresh produce. The app provides an intuitive online shopping experience with product cards, lists, and well-defined flows. Built with Flutter and Dart, including animations, loading states, and screen transitions.
portfolio.unimidia: Development of a responsive digital menu system for desktop, mobile, and Android applications. The platform includes administrative panels, TV display control, and informational cards, aimed at businesses looking to increase sales through visual communication. Built with React, TypeScript, styled-components, and Radix UI, with a future marketplace evolution planned.
